general_provisions: This bill amends provisions regarding electric assisted bicycles and other devices.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>clarifies that the definition of motorcycle includes a motorcycle being powered by an electric or combustion engine;<hr><ltbullet>makes it unlawful to consume alcohol while operating an electric assisted bicycle;<hr><ltbullet>addresses tampering with or modifying equipment beyond the manufacturer's original settings on an electric assisted bicycle or motorcycle;<hr><ltbullet>requires an individual under 21 years old to wear a helmet while operating certain devices on a highway;<hr><ltbullet>allows a peace officer to hold an individual's electric vehicle and release it to a parent if the peace officer observes a violation and the individual is under 18 years old;<hr><ltbullet>creates a safety course for the operation of certain electric devices on a highway and describes the circumstances under which the course is required; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical changes.
last_action_owner: Waiting for Introduction in the Senate
